scripts.db:generate: npx dotenv -e .env -- npx prisma generate --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: npx dotenv -e .env -- npx prisma migrate dev --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma --name init
scripts.db:push: npx dotenv -e .env -- npx prisma db push --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:studio: npx dotenv -e .env -- npx prisma studio --schema packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
